de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.affinitypropagation

Class AffinityPropagationClusteringAlgorithm<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<MedoidModel>>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.affinitypropagation.AffinityPropagationClusteringAlgorithm<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<MedoidModel>>

    @Title(value="Affinity Propagation: Clustering by Passing Messages Between Data Points")
 @Reference(title="Clustering by Passing Messages Between Data Points",
           authors="B. J. Frey, D. Dueck",
           booktitle="Science Vol 315",
           url="https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1136800",
           bibkey="doi:10.1126/science.1136800")
public class AffinityPropagationClusteringAlgorithm<O>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<MedoidModel>>
implements ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<MedoidModel>>
    Cluster analysis by affinity propagation.

    Reference:

    B. J. Frey, D. Dueck
    Clustering by Passing Messages Between Data Points
    Science Vol 315

    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
